title: Lose My Heart to the Lovely Kitten Princess - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Harem   Josei   Romance   Supernatural
tags: Ancient China   Female Protagonist   Ghosts   Imperial Harem   Pets   Reincarnated as a Monster   Slow Romance   Strong Love Interests   Transformation Ability
author: Yue Xiamian   月下眠
description:
This was such a cruel, cruel world! Cheng Xiaoxiao ironically perished from choking on a piece of a snack just as she was about to win her third competitive eating championship. Then she transmigrated to the land of Chu as the stunning Prince Jing’s furry feline.

Although Prince Jing found her dubious at first, he saved her and took her in out of curiosity. He then embarked on a life with a remarkably intelligent and intriguing lion cat. How did things go this way? It turned out that Netherworld messed up and lost her reincarnation quota to this cat! To make up for the embarrassing clerical error, they guaranteed her a blessed next life, and all they needed was some time!

Will Cheng Xiaoxiao prevail in struggling to stay alive while she waited for her turn? What fantastic and romantic story will be unfolded between this little kitten and the charming prince? With curiosity and joy, let’s search the answer in this marvelous book!>
